name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 142
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Feeling Boxed In. After 142 of these I'm beginning to feel a bit boxed in by the format so I decided to experiment a little and do something different.
